Articles.Content: I am looking around the forums for a good subassembly Loader plugin and I wonder if you guys could give me some input. Subassembly Loader worked amazing, but the .20 fix has been taken down so I cant use it, and payloader just won't work on my mac, even after running the terminal command. What are some alternatives? Alternatively, it would be great if someone could tell me how to make payloader work, the Contents/MacOS/JavaApplicationStub command just leaves the app "Damaged and can't be opened"
I find a text editor to be the best subassembly loader, bar none, but I don't think they come in plugin form.
Can I get a PM too? I also want sub assembly solutions.
I'm having problems with subassembly myself at the moment. I have the mod and I've got it where my stuff from 0.19 will load up without issues; it won't save any new subassemblies, though.
Yeah something broke recently, no idea why. Mine doesn't save anymore either.
I've been having problems with sub-assembly loader, lately. It tends to stick things through other things. Is there a fix going round?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30696-0-20-Subassembly-Loader-0-20-Compatibility-Patch

It's really not that hard to find
